name: Generate AI-written newsletter and assets to HubSpot contacts and SharePoint

parameters.text:
=You are a marketing copywriter tasked with creating content for a B2B newsletter on newly released features of plemeo.ai.
plemeo.ai is an AI-powered business automation platform designed for SMEs and enterprise teams. It combines configurable AI agents with deep system integrations (e.g., email, calendar, CRM, voice, ads) to automate workflows such as meeting scheduling, customer communication, reporting, and document handling. It supports both cloud-based (EU-hosted) and on-premise deployments—offering secure, modular process automation without requiring large IT migrations.

** NEW FEATURES **
{{ $('Receive Request').first().json.body.text }}

The newsletter template uses the following structure for BOTH German and English versions:

**German Content:**
- {INTRODUCTION_DE}: A 2–3 sentence engaging intro that outlines why the topic is relevant now
- {TOPIC_DE}: The main topic/headline for the section (max. 8 words)
- {DESCRIPTION_DE}: A detailed description of what's new or important about this topic (3-4 sentences)
- {TEASER1_DE}, {TEASER2_DE}, {TEASER3_DE}: Three highlight points showcasing key benefits, insights, or developments (1-2 sentences each)
- {CTA_DE}: A compelling call-to-action encouraging engagement (max. 20 words)
- {FOOTER_TEXT_DE}: Professional closing message (1-2 sentences)
- {FOOTER_NAME_DE}: Sender name/signature

**English Content:**
- {TOPIC_TITLE_EN}: Main newsletter title in English (max. 8 words)
- {INTRODUCTION_EN}: English version of the engaging intro (2–3 sentences)
- {TOPIC_EN}: English version of the main topic/headline (max. 8 words)
- {DESCRIPTION_EN}: English version of the detailed description (3-4 sentences)
- {TEASER1_EN}, {TEASER2_EN}, {TEASER3_EN}: English versions of the three highlight points (1-2 sentences each)
- {CTA_EN}: English version of the call-to-action (max. 20 words)
- {FOOTER_TEXT_EN}: English version of professional closing message (1-2 sentences)
- {FOOTER_NAME_EN}: English version sender name/signature

Tone: professional but accessible, informative, slightly optimistic  
Audience: decision-makers and professionals in marketing, tech, and innovation roles

Please return the result as structured JSON in this format:

```json
{
  "INTRODUCTION_DE": "",
  "TOPIC_DE": "",
  "DESCRIPTION_DE": "",
  "TEASER1_DE": "",
  "TEASER2_DE": "",
  "TEASER3_DE": "",
  "CTA_DE": "",
  "FOOTER_TEXT_DE": "",
  "FOOTER_NAME_DE": "",
  "TOPIC_TITLE_EN": "",
  "INTRODUCTION_EN": "",
  "TOPIC_EN": "",
  "DESCRIPTION_EN": "",
  "TEASER1_EN": "",
  "TEASER2_EN": "",
  "TEASER3_EN": "",
  "CTA_EN": "",
  "FOOTER_TEXT_EN": "",
  "FOOTER_NAME_EN": ""
}
```

=You are a Social Media Content Creator. The goal is to create a video, audio and image that will get posted along with a blog text as a blog post to the website.
Create a Prompt for video generation, audio generation and image generation that is in line with the usecase and the topic. The prompt should be maximum 1 sentence (short to medium length). The image should not contain any text or images that have text in it (i.e. computer screen with text). The image prompt should maximum have 110 characters.
The audio prompt should not be a negative prompt, the intent is to describe which melody or style of music to pick.

** USER-PROMPT ***
{{ $('Receive Request').first().json.body.text }}

Output the 3 fields in a json format with "video_prompt" and "audio_prompt" and "image _prompt".

=Please extract 4 fields out of the following query. Respond with a valid JSON object.
1) "include_video" - boolean, if not determined "false"
2) "video_duration" - string, if not determined "5". If user wants more than 5, set it to "10". Possible values: either "5" or "10". If the user wants less than 5, set it to "5".
3) "hubspot" - boolean, if not determined "true"
4) "sharepoint" - boolean, if not determined "false"

3) and 4) are about the WF result. The user has 3 options. Either only send the generated newsletter to the hubspot contacts, or only store the Newsletter + Image/Video in the SharePoint or do both.

** USER QUERY ***
{{$('Receive Request').first().json.body.text }}

parameters.subject: plemeo.ai Newsletter
parameters.bodyContent:
={{ $('Build Newsletter').item.json.newsletter_content }}
{{ $json.video?.url ? `
▶ Watch Video
` : '' }}

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.message:
={{ $json.newsletter_content }}
{{ $json.video?.url ? `
▶ Watch Video
` : '' }}
parameters.subject: Newsletter Approval

parameters.content:
## Who’s it for  
Marketing, growth, and automation teams that need to ship polished bilingual newsletters—complete with images, optional video, and multi-channel distribution—without writing a line of code.

## How it works / What it does  
1. A **Webhook** receives a plain-language request (e.g. “Create a newsletter about XYZ and store it in SharePoint”). The **Webhook** can be changed to another trigger, fr example **Manual Trigger**.
2. An **AI Agent** (OpenAI GPT-4o) drafts German & English newsletter copy following a strict JSON schema.  
3. **SharePoint** fetches an HTML template; a **Code** node injects AI copy into the placeholders.  
4. Optional creative assets:  
   - **Pollinations AI** → image (resolution check & frame overlay)  
   - **FAL AI** → short video + Lyria2 audio → merged via FFmpeg API  
5. A **Gmail Approval** step sends the draft to an approver; the flow continues only on “Approve”.  
6. Depending on user intent the workflow:  
   - Emails the newsletter to **HubSpot** contacts, and/or  
   - Saves HTML (+ JPG/Video URL) to a **SharePoint** library.  

## How to set up  
1. Import the template
2. Open the yellow sticky note and follow the checklist 
   - Create credentials for OpenAI, HubSpot (App Token), Microsoft 365, Gmail, and FAL AI.  
   - Enter them in n8n Credential Manager (never in the HTTP node).  
3. Edit the **Configuration Settings** Set node with your ENV_* variables.   
4. Activate the workflow, copy the production Webhook URL, and trigger it with JSON body `{ "text": "…" }` or with a desired trigger.

## Requirements  
- OpenAI account
- Microsoft 365 tenant (SharePoint & Outlook)  
- HubSpot App Token  
- FAL AI API Key (video & audio generation)  

## How to customize  
- Want a different language? Tweak the AI prompt inside **AI Agent**.  
- Want a different storage provider? Change the SharePoint nodes to Google Drive or Dropbox.
- Skip video generation: set `include_video` to `false` in the incoming prompt.  
- Change the distribution logic by adjusting the **WF Result** Switch node.  
- Add more channels (e.g. Slack) by inserting additional branches after the Switch and modifying the intent determination at the beginning of the workflow.

## Video Assets Branch
 
## What it does
Uses FAL AI to turn the original image into a short video and Lyria2 to create background audio.
Merges video+audio via FFmpeg API ➜ returns a public video.url.

## Credentials needed
FAL AI API Key (ENV_FALAI_APIKEY) – stored in the Configuration Settings Set node.

## Fields you can tweak
- ENV_INCLUDE_VIDEO (boolean) – set in Configuration Settings or incoming user prompt.
- ENV_FALAI_VIDEO_DURATION – default 5 s or 10 s.
- video_prompt & audio_prompt – produced by Generate Video & Audio Prompt; edit that prompt for creative control.

## Sharepoint Storage Branch

## What it does
Converts newsletter HTML, the generated JPG, and (optionally) the video URL into binary files.
Uploads them to a chosen SharePoint document library for archival / CMS use.

## Credentials needed
Microsoft SharePoint OAuth2 credential (used by all three “Upload …” nodes).

## Fields you can tweak
sharepoint flag – set via Determine Intent (true/false).
Destination folder IDs – in each “Upload …” node under Folder; swap to any library you prefer.
Filename pattern – currently ${random_filename}.html/.jpg/.txt; adjust in node parameters.

## HubSpot Distribution Branch

## What it does
Pulls last 10 contacts via HubSpot node, loops through them, and emails each person the bilingual newsletter (HTML body) plus image and optional video link using Outlook.

## Credentials needed
- HubSpot App Token credential (HubSpot node).
- Microsoft Outlook OAuth2 credential (Send a message node).

## Fields you can tweak
- hubspot flag – comes from Determine Intent → set to true/false in the incoming webhook JSON.
- Email subject / BCC list – editable directly in the Send a message node.
- Batch size – change “Limit” in HubSpot node or Split-In-Batches node settings.

## Image Assets Branch

## What it does
- Uses Pollinations AI to create a 1080 × 1350 image from image_prompt.
- Converts base64 → binary → uploads to a service which returns the download url of the image.

## Credentials needed
- None (Pollinations accept unauthenticated HTTP).

## Fields you can tweak
- image_prompt – generated in Generate Video & Audio Prompt; edit that prompt for style changes.
- Destination of the upload – change the URL in Send Data to Download Service to your server/CDN.

body.text: Erstelle einen Newsletter zu neuen plemeo.ai Features: Verbesserte Telefonate und 600 Integrationen von MCPs (inkl. kurzer Erklärung von MCPs). Bitte ein Bild hinzufügen. Speichere in Sharepoint.

main.node: Send message and wait for response
